definition: periodic shedding of the cuticle in arthropods or the outer skin in reptiles, cast off hair, skin, horn, or feathers
details:
noun
- periodic shedding of the cuticle in arthropods or the outer skin in reptiles
= synonyms: molting, moult, moulting, ecdysis
verb
- cast off hair, skin, horn, or feathers
= synonyms: shed
